SEARCH
Package utils

Class Query

java.lang.Object
utils.Query
public class Query extends Object
The Query class contains static methods that are used to query the application data.

    • filterByActive

      public static List<Models.User.Borrows> filterByActive(String active)
      Filters the list of borrows by their active status.
      Parameters:
      active - The active status to filter by. Can be "All", "True", or "False".
      Returns:
      A list of borrows that match the specified active status.

    • changeBookTitle

      public static void changeBookTitle(String oldTitle, String newTitle, String newISBN)
      Changes the title and ISBN of a book in the library system.
      Parameters:
      oldTitle - The current title of the book.
      newTitle - The new title to be assigned to the book.
      newISBN - The new ISBN (International Standard Book Number) to be assigned to the book.

    • removeBook

      public static void removeBook(Models.Book book)
      Removes a book from the library and all associated borrows by users.
      Parameters:
      book - The book to be removed.

    • changeCategoryTitle

      public static void changeCategoryTitle(String oldTitle, String newTitle)
      Changes the category title of books from oldTitle to newTitle.
      Parameters:
      oldTitle - The old category title to be changed.
      newTitle - The new category title to replace the old title.

    • removeCategory

      public static void removeCategory(Models.Category category)
      Removes a category and all books associated with it.
      Parameters:
      category - The category to be removed.

    • changeUsername

      public static void changeUsername(String oldUsername, String newUsername)
      Changes the username of all reviews associated with a given old username to a new username.
      Parameters:
      oldUsername - The old username to be replaced.
      newUsername - The new username to replace the old username.

    • removeUser

      public static void removeUser(Models.User user)
      Removes a user from the application, including their reviews and borrowed books.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to be removed.

    • getAllActiveBorrows

      public static List<javafx.util.Pair<String,Models.User.Borrows>> getAllActiveBorrows()
      Retrieves all active borrows from the list of users.
      Returns:
      A list of pairs containing the username and the active borrow for each user.

    • returnBook

      public static void returnBook(String username, String title)
      Returns a book by marking it as inactive in the user's borrowed books list and removing the borrow record from the book.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user returning the book
      title - the title of the book being returned

    • searchBorrowByTitle

      public static List<javafx.util.Pair<String,Models.User.Borrows>> searchBorrowByTitle(String title)
      Searches for borrows by title.
      Parameters:
      title - the title to search for
      Returns:
      a list of pairs containing the title and corresponding borrow objects

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      a list of pairs containing the username and corresponding borrows
